description: Early morning, Jace Tyler takes in the Sunday sunrise in his London apartment. The pounding sounds of the shower play in the background as Eric Star is getting ready for the day. Eric comes out of the shower and pauses for a moment taking in Jace’s serenity. Jace looks away from the beautiful morning view to find the stunning view of Erik’s naked body. The two men approach each other and meet in the middle, lying on the couch and holding each other as they kiss for what feels like the first time. They make love while the morning sun shines down on them.
title: Early Riser
